price: 4. Y no hemos destruido ninguna ciudad cuyo final no estuviera decretado.
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā walahā kitābun maʿlūmun
